name: Dollar Street
description: Dollar Street allows exploring how people live all across the globe interactively. A team of photographers has documented over 200 homes in almost 50 countries so far, and the list is growing.
solutions: The Angular framework was updated to stable Angular 2 and later—Angular 7
D3.js used for drawing the main navigation element
outcome: The powerful and heavy-load optimized analytical environment with great design and good performance on extremely huge amounts of data.

Technology stack: JavaScript to TypeScript migration (front and back end)
Jasmine to Mocha, Chai, Sinon migrations
